featured.text: “My weight dropped to 48.3 from 54.4 kilograms, and my classmates won’t be able to call me ‘porker’ anymore,” Chang said happily.

definition.zh_def: 同班同學，指在同一班級或課程中學習的學生。
definition.en_def: A student who is in the same class or course as another student.
definition.example: My classmate helped me with my homework.
